# Required Firewall Openings

<FirewallOpeningsIntro/>

## Replicated Embedded Cluster

The following firewall openings are required for online installations with Embedded Cluster:

<FirewallOpeningsEc/>

## Helm CLI Installations with Replicated

The following firewall openings are required for online installations with the Helm CLI:

<FirewallOpeningsHelm/>

## Replicated KOTS (Existing Cluster)

The following firewall openings are required for online installations in existing clusters with KOTS:

<FirewallOpeningsKots/>

## Replicated kURL

The following firewall openings are required for online installations with kURL:

<FirewallOpeningsKurl/>
